channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats’ Favorite Talking Point About Children And Gun Deaths Is A Lie
item.description: Gun control advocates often claim that guns are the leading cause of death among children — but that is false.

item.title: 'Trans women are women': Dem Scott Wiener sends message to musician after locker-room attack
item.description: California state Sen. Scott Wiener had a message for women fearful of males in their locker rooms: Trans women are women.

item.title: Donald Trump Has No Answers for the Younger Generation
item.description: An atmosphere of discontent and disintegration is forming around the Zoomer class.

item.title: The Military’s Recruiting Surge
item.description: For a few years, the all-volunteer military construct was failing. Fresh thinking, financial resources, and untold amounts of effort have turned thing...

item.title: Congress Should Stop Passing the Buck to the Bureaucracy
item.description: The longer Congress writes laws that read like mission statements, the more frustrated voters will be when the mission goes sideways.

item.title: How Social Justice Destroyed Environmentalists
item.description: The Sierra Club is a cautionary tale.

item.title: The American Dream Is Harder To Reach For Millennials And Gen Z: Here’s The Math
item.description: A 50-year mortgage, an eight-year car loan, and a forever college payment. Is this the best we can do for our young people?

item.title: Sen. Fetterman's maverick mantra of 'country over party' increasingly frustrates fellow Democrats
item.description: Pennsylvania Sen. John Fetterman's independent streak is once again drawing fire from Democrats and praise from Republicans, as he reinforces his wild...

item.title: Utah Ruling Exposes GOP Retreat On Redistricting Battle
item.description: As 2026 draws near, if things continue on the same path as they are now, Republicans can kiss their majorities goodbye.

item.title: It’s Impossible To Keep Up With The Fall Of Britain
item.description: The United Kingdom is now in a rolling crisis that its leaders can neither manage nor control. We should pay attention.

item.title: Trump to host dinner with Jamie Dimon, other top business executives

item.title: What to know about Trump's plan to give Americans a $2,000 tariff dividend
item.description: President Donald Trump boasts that his tariffs protect American industries, lure factories to the United States, raise money for the federal governmen...

item.title: Justice Kennedy’s Memoir Illustrates The Shortcomings Of Flaky Conservative Jurisprudence
item.description: Kennedy's style of judicial interpretation is one that too often deviates from what the Constitution requires.

item.title: Ex-Rep. Elaine Luria announces candidacy for her former House seat in Virginia
item.description: Former Rep. Elaine Luria, who lost reelection in 2022, is launching a comeback bid for her old congressional seat in Virginia.

item.title: Frankenstein — Forever Childish
item.description: Del Toro’s remake refuses to grow up.
